intro: Boerhavia hualienensis, commonly known as Hualien boerhavia, is a flowering plant native to Taiwan. Its leaves are usually lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, which help reduce water loss in its native habitat. Boerhavia hualienensis is often found in rocky or sandy soils in open areas, showcasing its adaptability to diverse environmental conditions.
